meta.description: Determine the optimal number of palladium-heavy and platinum-heavy catalysts to maximize the conversion of carbon monoxide to carbon dioxide.

sets.name: CATALYSTS
sets.description: Types of catalysts used in the conversion process.

params.name: platinum_requirement
params.description: Units of platinum required per catalyst type.

params.name: palladium_requirement
params.description: Units of palladium required per catalyst type.

params.name: conversion_rate
params.description: Conversion rate to carbon dioxide per catalyst type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of catalyst to use.

objective.name: max_conversion
objective.description: Maximize the total conversion of carbon monoxide to carbon dioxide.

constraints.name: platinum_constraint
constraints.description: Total platinum used by catalysts cannot exceed available platinum.

constraints.name: palladium_constraint
constraints.description: Total palladium used by catalysts cannot exceed available palladium.
